title: KDP Keyword Research - How to Choose an SEO-Optimized Title for Your Book
description:
KDP Keyword Research - How to Choose an SEO-Optimized Title for Your Book

Hi, my name is Tiz Coppoli, and welcome to my channel! I hope you'll enjoy the video, please press the like button if you like it, and feel free to leave a comment down below, even to say just 'Hello' of course!

In this video, I'm going to talk about the number one problem that every self-publisher usually faces, which is finding the perfect keywords for a new title.

I'm going to start from the very beginning by explaining what a keyword is, why keywords are important when selling a book on Amazon, the difference between long-tail and short-tail keywords, and lastly, what are the advantages of using one instead of the other.

Don't forget to subscribe if you liked this video and if you want to know more about how to make a profit by publishing books on Amazon KDP,  what I'm doing with my life, and my journey to financial freedom.
